typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Tabla1CliendID
source(output(
		ClenteID as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Cod_Postal as string,
		RegionID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Tabla2ClienteID
Tabla1CliendID, Tabla2ClienteID join({Cliente ID} == ClenteID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
